overview: Mrs Mantis has recently devoured her husband. She is seated in a dimly lit bar, mulling over this perfectly regular series of events. Memories of Mr Mantis fill her with lust and reluctant regret. Although Mrs Mantis considers herself a strong and independent woman, she is somehow struggling to come to terms with this perfectly normal occurrence.
tagline: I devoured my husband last night. As one does...
title: Mr & Mrs Mantis
